A common sense approach for the existing problems for families struggling to afford to take children away in school holidays.

Each council or even county to have different school holidays effectively meaning the main six weeks summer holiday would be anywhere between early June to early September.

May half term could be staggered throughout the month of May and end of spring term staggered throughout April
This would mean from April to September at all times some schools would be out of term forcing the travel companies to have lower and more consistent pricing
